launch: Welcome to the hardest Game of Thrones quiz ever!
begin: The quiz has ten questions to test your Game of Thrones knowledge. Let's get started. Good luck.

questions.question: Robb Stark’s wife, Talisa Maegyr, was raised in which free city
questions.reveal: She was raised in Volantis. She vowed never to live in a slave city, and relocated to Westeros.

questions.question: Yoren, the Night’s Watchman, tells Arya about his longstanding grudge against the man who killed his brother. What was the name of the man who killed Yoren’s brother?
questions.reveal: Willem killed Yoren’s brother. Yoren had his revenge when Willem returned to his hometown years later.

questions.question: Who gives Tyrion his facial scar during the Battle of the Blackwater?
questions.reveal: Mandon Moore gave Tyrion his facial scar. Joffrey ordered Moore, a member of the Kingsguard, to kill Tyrion on the battlefield.

questions.question: We meet three of Oberyn Martell’s daughters, known as the Sand Snakes. How many does he have in total?
questions.reveal: Oberyn mentions his eight, illegitimate daughters to Cersei in Series 4.

questions.question: Which of the following houses only became one of the Great Houses of Westeros after Aegon Targaryen's invasion?
questions.reveal: House Tyrell became one of the Great Houses of Westeros, but before Aegon Targaryen’s conquest, House Gardener ruled the Reach.

questions.question: King Joffrey gave Harrenhal, to Petyr Baelish, but who previously had royal title to it?
questions.reveal: Tyrion dispossesses Lord Janos Slynt of Harrenhal, when he ships him to the Wall in series 2.

questions.question: The Faith Militant caused a lot of problems for Cersei. Under the reign of which Targaryen king were they last active?
questions.reveal: Jaehaerys, known as “the Conciliator”, cut a deal with the Faith Militant and disbanded them.

questions.question: In the first episode of series 5, a young Cersei visits a woods witch. What is the name of the friend who accompanies her?
questions.reveal: In the Game of Thrones books Cersei visits the witch with two friends, but in the TV show it’s just Melara Hetherspoon.

questions.question: There are 19 castles along the Wall. To which one does Jon Snow try to send Janos Slynt in series 5?
questions.reveal: The castle is Greyguard. Janos Slynt refuses to go, so Jon Snow beheads him.

questions.question: After the Greyjoy Rebellion, who did Jorah Mormont defeat to win the tournament at Lannisport?
questions.reveal: Jorah defeated Jaime Lannister, and married Lynesse Hightower shortly afterwards.

score: Out of ten questions you scored {{score}} correct.
